channel.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
channel.description: OKAY when i open my runserver.bat it comes up with the black box but right away it goes back down!! it used to work before, but i needed to compile and somone said edit my envirment lables and when i went to edit them Path and classpath wasnt there.. so i added both of them and put in what it said 2 on one of the guides 2 make a server and it still didnt work with my compiling then i went to go put my server back on and it didnt work! i need alot of help.. and i hope there is a simple answer.. please help sombody? oh yeah.. and vote :P i wanna see what u guys say.. and of course.. u guys HAVE 2 act normal and not tel me 2 beat myself with wood.. lol THANKS for voting.. we hae a tie so far.. is it guna be rape myself or beat me with wood..? yeah but really i still need help with this..

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

We have the latest Java and JDK… its just somthing wrong with out enviorment labels and we dont know whats up with them… at least i thik thats whats up… it may be a little diferent for him but thats whats up with mine… and like all of my friends that hav tried make servers this is the same problem…except i once had my server running fine.

THING I LEARNED! DONT MESS WITH UR ENVIORMENT LABELS ONCE U OT THEM WORKING FINE!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2008, 05:52:04 AM[/size][hr]Cmawwwnn… i need help here :S fine… u guys want a reward?? ill give admin for the FIRST ONE 2 FIGURE OUT THE ANSWER 2 THIS!!

Read full topic

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:221636”]replace it with

@echo off
java -cp . server
pause[/quote]

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

no, it did the same thing… what happened was, my compiler didnt work and som1 said 2 edit my enviorment labels… so i saw that PATH and CLASSPATH werent there… so i added them and put in what i was supposed 2 add into them and it didnt work afterthat… i used an auto clicker 2 rapidly press on my runserver icon, and i noticed it said tht ‘JAVA’ was not recognized as a internal or external command[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2008, 11:57:10 PM[/size][hr]there was a difference that time… it didnt exit right away when i changed it 2 that, but it said exactly the same thing as before…

Read full topic
item.source: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“kid2kewl2bereal, post:5, topic:221636”]@echo off
color 0a
title Hiyascape v2
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

i added the pause[/quote]
replace it with

@echo off
java -cp . server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

My runserver.bat looks like this @echo off COLOR 02 title funscap3 java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
When I open it, it says: Starting funscap3 on 0.0.0.0:43594

and it works fine, try that? :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2008, 11:53:12 PM[/size][hr]Also it can help if you download latest jdk, latest jdk is jdk7 u 6 i think.

Read full topic
